title: BACnetEventCallback (Method)
text:
METHOD BACnetEventCallback : BOOL
Hook callback for IEC_BACNET_CB_TYPE.CB_UTC_TIME_SYNC

rows.Name: EventId
rows.Comment:
If only one event is possibly called, the following Ids can be ignored. If there are more
at least the EventId should be checked, to get the right type of pParameter.ID of the occured Event. Contains the class and the event (see CmpBACnet.EVENTIDS)

rows:
Id of the parameter structure (see pParameter and
CmpBACnet.EVENTIDS)

Version of the parameter structure (see pParameter and
CmpBACnet.EVENTIDS)

Pointer to the event specific parameter, that is specified
by Id (see CmpBACnet.EVENTIDS and CmpBACnet, i.e.
EVT_BACNET_ACKALARM)
